author: tehgreybob

text: MOONMAN'S Fandango (#768) is easily my favorite Virtual Boy track, but this fun theme also stood out from this game's soundtrack. I played very few games on the VB, but I liked them all (I guess I purchased the good ones). I still remember its distinctive smell which I think was coming out of the foam padding. Good times, though I'm still bewildered that this console ever existed in the first place.
